items.sentence: Tom is one of the laziest people that I know.
Tom will only be in Australia for three days.

Certainly, my knowledge of French is limited.

The stranger challenged Tom to a streetfight.
I only ordered coffee, since I wasn't hungry.
I don't like this hat. I prefer the gray one.
I can write good stories when I feel like it.
